headline: Assessing Becton Dickinson’s (BDX) Valuation After a Year-to-Date Share Price Decline
summary: Becton Dickinson (BDX) has quietly slipped this year, with the stock down about 16% year to date even as annual revenue and net income still show steady growth. This creates a potentially interesting entry point. See our latest analysis for Becton Dickinson. Over the past few months, Becton Dickinson’s share price has bounced around as investors weigh its steady 1 year revenue and net income growth against concerns about valuation and slower device demand. The 1 month share price return has...
